name: Meals on Wheels San Francisco
description: Meals on Wheels San Francisco delivers nutritious meals to homebound seniors and adults with disabilities throughout San Francisco, ensuring no one goes hungry due to age, illness, or isolation.
fullDescription: Meals on Wheels San Francisco delivers nutritious meals to homebound seniors and adults with disabilities throughout San Francisco, ensuring no one goes hungry due to age, illness, or isolation.
whatTheyOffer:
- Hot lunch delivered Monday-Friday
- Weekend meal options
- Culturally diverse menu options
- Special diets accommodated
- Friendly volunteer check-ins
- No one turned away for inability to pay
howToGetIt: Call or apply online. You must be 60+ or have a disability and be primarily homebound. Staff will assess your needs and arrange meal delivery schedule.
keywords: Meals on Wheels, San Francisco, home delivered meals, senior meals, homebound, disabled, hot lunch, culturally diverse, special diet
